material.mattext: Describe the distribution of the variable 'Friends' in context:

The students are NOT divided equally among the three categories. About 50% of the students find it as easy to make friends with the opposite sex as with the same sex. Among the other 50% of the students, the majority (36.2%) find it easier to make friends with the opposite sex, and the remainder (13.7%) find it easier to make friends with people of their own sex.
